name: Out Of Isolation (Alpha)
description:
You don't know who you are but you know you are in a creepy hospital and prison. Your mission is to get out without getting catched by the police or the doctors

This is a Alpha, please give me your Feedback. Thanks!

I developed the hole alpha during march and april 2020, during quarantine .

The Controls are just W,A,S,D and if you press F at the same time you speed up. But this information are also in the first level.
